article_title: HEARD ON THE STREET: Risks from BP's Russian Connections
article_text:
BP's business is heading in the right direction. But investors must brace for an increasingly chill wind from the east.

The U.K. oil and gas giant's solid first-half results were overshadowed by the escalating tensions between the West and Russia, where BP owns a 20% stake in state-controlled Rosneft. With harsher sanctions against Russia expected imminently, BP's involvement with the country's largest oil company looks set to be a...

twitter.description: Escalating tensions between the West and Russia may have little near-term impact on BP's business but could still weigh on the company's valuation.
twitter.title: Risks from BP's Russian Connections
